sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"接触"之意。
means: contact ： 强调紧密接触的两个物体之间的相互关系。也可用作比喻。
touch ： 指具体意义"接触"时，强调动作；表抽象意义时，侧重"联系"。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"遇见，会见，碰见"之意。
means: meet ： 普通用词，本义指双方或多方从不同方向或相反方向作向对运动，最终相碰(遇)。
encounter ： 通常指遇到困难或挫折，也指偶然或意外地相遇。
confront ： 不可避免的，面对面的相遇。也指敢于正视困难或问题的决心和信心。
face ： 侧重双方静止地面对面，或指指充满勇气、信心和决心正视人或事。
contact ： 多指通过书信、电话或直接会面和别人联系。口语用词。

word_mean: 元件中与对应的导电零件相配合以提供电气通路的导电零件。

sentence.Network_en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentence.Network_cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentence.Network_en: The college has brought me into contact with western ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 上大学使我接触了西方的思想。

sentence.Network_en: He made contact with someone with an idea for reconditioning laser copiers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他联系了一个会修理激光复印机的人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin contactus, from contact- 'touched, grasped, bordered on', from the verb contingere, from con- 'together with' + tangere 'to touch'

entry.def: Contact involves meeting or communicating with someone, especially regularly.

example.ex: Opposition leaders are denying any contact with the government in Kabul...
example.tran: 反对派领袖否认与喀布尔政府有任何联系。

example.ex: He forbade contacts between directors and executives outside his presence.
example.tran: 他禁止董事与管理层绕开他私下进行任何联系。

entry.def: If you are in contact with someone, you regularly meet them or communicate with them.

example.ex: He was in direct contact with the kidnappers...
example.tran: 他与绑架者有直接联系。

entry.def: If you contact someone, you telephone them, write to them, or go to see them in order to tell or ask them something.

example.ex: Contact the Tourist Information Bureau for further details...
When she first contacted me Frances was upset.
example.tran: 弗朗西丝第一次与我联系时很心烦意乱。

entry.tran: (信息、电话号码等)供联系的，供联络的
entry.def: Your contact details or number are information such as a telephone number where you can be contacted.

example.ex: You must leave your full name and contact details when you phone.
example.tran: 打电话时须留下全名与联络信息。

entry.def: If you come into contact with someone or something, you meet that person or thing in the course of your work or other activities.

example.ex: Doctors I came into contact with voiced their concern...
example.tran: 我接触到的医生都表示了他们的担心。

example.ex: The college has brought me into contact with western ideas.
example.tran: 上大学使我接触了西方的思想。

entry.def: If you make contact with someone, you find out where they are and talk or write to them.

example.ex: Then, after she had become famous, he tried to make contact with her.
example.tran: 后来，她出名之后，他曾试图与她联系。

entry.tran: 与…失去联系;与…断了联系
entry.def: If you lose contact with someone who you have been friendly with, you no longer see them, speak to them, or write to them.

example.ex: Though they all live nearby, I lost contact with them really quickly...
example.tran: 虽然他们都住在附近，但我很快与他们失去了联系。

example.ex: Mother and son lost contact when Nicholas was in his early twenties.
example.tran: 尼古拉斯20岁出头的时候母子就失去了联系。

entry.def: When people or things are in contact, they are touching each other.

example.ex: They compared how these organisms behaved when left in contact with different materials...
example.tran: 他们比较了与不同材料接触时这些生物体的反应。

example.ex: The cry occurs when air is brought into contact with the baby's larynx...
example.tran: 婴儿的喉咙接触到空气时，就会哭出来。

entry.def: Radio contact is communication by means of radio.

example.ex: He failed to make radio contact.
example.tran: 他未能进行无线电联络。

example.ex: ...a technical problem reported by the pilot moments before he lost contact with the control tower.
example.tran: 飞行员与控制塔失去联络前不久报告的技术故障

entry.def: A contact is someone you know in an organization or profession who helps you or gives you information.

example.ex: Their contact in the United States Embassy was called Phil.
example.tran: 他们在美国大使馆的熟人叫菲尔。

sentences.sentence: "they claimed that they had been in contact with extraterrestrial beings"

means.word_mean: 2. the state or condition of touching or of being in immediate proximity;

sentences.sentence: "litmus paper turns red on contact with an acid"
"her fingers came in contact with the light switch"

means.word_mean: 4. the physical coming together of two or more things;

sentences.sentence: "contact with the pier scraped paint from the hull"

means.word_mean: 5. a person who is in a position to give you special assistance;

sentences.sentence: "he used his business contacts to get an introduction to the governor"

means.word_mean: 6. a channel for communication between groups;

sentences.sentence: "he provided a liaison with the guerrillas"

means.word_mean: 7. (electronics) a junction where things (as two electrical conductors) touch or are in physical contact;

sentences.sentence: "the pilot made contact with the base"
"he got in touch with his colleagues"

means.word_mean: 9. a thin curved glass or plastic lens designed to fit over the cornea in order to correct vision or to deliver medication
1. be in or establish communication with;

sentences.sentence: "He never contacted his children after he emigrated to Australia"

means.word_mean: 2. be in direct physical contact with; make contact;

sentences.sentence: "The wire must not contact the metal cover"

auth_sentence.content: I say these are like any other contact lenses.
auth_sentence.res_content: I say these are like any other contact lenses.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完整无缺的,未经触动的,未受损伤的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in无+tact接触→adj.完整无缺的,未经触动的,未受损伤的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 机智的, 得体的, 圆滑的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tact[n.机敏,圆滑,得体]+ful表形容词→adj.机智的, 得体的, 圆滑的
tact接触+ual……的→adj.触觉的,凭感觉的

Sentence.sentence: She wanted to renew her contact with the Peace Corps.
well, I contacted his office half an hour ago, and his secretary said he was out for lunch until 2:
She thinks that she may have to contact the Occupational Safety and Health Administration and asked that government agency to inspect the department.
of those she interviewed said that contact with their sisters and brothers increase innate adulthood.
They have little time left to renew contact with their brothers and sisters

Both strains quickly invaded local hospitals when needle sharing and other unhealthy practices ensured the rapid spreading of the infection by bringing people into contact with contaminated body fluids.

sentences.en: My hand came into contact with a small lump.
Farm workers frequently come in contact with these insecticides.
sentences.cn: 农场工人常常接触这些杀虫剂。

means.word_mean: 联系, 联络, 交往

sentences.en: I'll get in contact with a rental car company.
sentences.cn: 我将和出租汽车公司联系。

means.word_mean: 社会关系, 熟人, 门路

sentences.en: the sliding contact of the potentiometer.
We agreed to contact again as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 我们同意尽快再次联系。

sentences.en: When you contact these two wires, the machine will start at once.
sentences.cn: 当你使这两条导线一接触，这台机器就会立刻开始运转。

means.word_mean: 与(某人)接触(或交往)，与…联系；[美国英语]与…通讯(或通话)

sentences.en: I'll contact Jenny and get her reaction.
sentences.cn: 我将与珍妮联系，看看她的反应如何。

jushi.english: Have the children been in contact with the disease?
jushi.chinese: 孩子们同这种疾病有过接触吗?

jushi.english: In his contact with others, he never forces people to accept his point of view.
jushi.chinese: 在与人交往中,他从不强迫别人接受他的观点。

jushi.english: Until recently, this remote tribe had little contact with the outside world.
jushi.chinese: 这个边远的部落直到最近和外界几乎都没有什么联系。
